page.title: 18Events in Newtown
page.content: JUNE 1/2 Mid-Wales Stampede. Flower Festival. Stratos Tour to Australia. JUNE 5th Newtown computer club visit to Elkay flectrical Ltd. JUNE 9th Mid Wales Motorways visit Bourmouth. JUNE 10th Art Exibition. JUNE 14th Stratos Tour to Dunkirk. JUNE 15th 1985 Across Wales Walk JUNE 19th Computer club Open Night. JUNE 27th Folk Club-Black Boy JUNE 29th Trip to Ludlow Stratos Tour to the Rhine. JULY 4th Theatr Hafren-'Taken Out'. JULY 6th Theatr Hafren-'Ken Dodd'. JULY 7th Trip to Portmadog. JULY 13th Newtown High Summer Fair. JULY 24th Trip to Royal Welsh Show. JULY 31st Theatr Hafren-'Toni Arthur's Music Box'.
